mapper.select: select count(*) from sale_act_order where project_id = #{projectId} and client_id = #{clientId} and status=#{status}

select o.id,o.code,o.status,o.money_sum,o.point_sum,o.pay_type,o.num,pay_time,o.cancel_time,o.check_time,attr.name attrName,attr.id attrId,act.name actName,act.address,act.portrait,act.id actId from sale_act_order o join sale_act_attr attr on attr.id = o.attr_id join sale_act act on act.id = attr.act_id where o.project_id=#{projectId} and o.client_id=#{clientId} and o.status=#{status} order by o.id desc
